title: Bitcoin Hold
author: Bitcoin Hold
content: How much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?Minimally and less positively, I think Bitcoin will be exchanged around $70,000 in 2024 with the halving in April next year. Usually it will take Bitcoin about 6 to 9 months after its halving day to break its past all time high and make a new all time high.I don't want to predict price but if your prediction must be based on history like previous bull markets.https://charts.bitbo.io/compare-bull-markets/

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: As time goes ---> Marketcap goes higher ---> Price increases (bull markets or not) will be significantly less dramatic ---> Volatility will be less dramatic

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?Bitcoin price usually minimum price growth from previous ATH to new ATH is double the price. I safely estimate based on the price history that 100k is the next target for the next bull run cycle after this bear season. I doubt that we are already starting since real bull market doesn’t move slow like this. We are already on the preparation stage for the big one.Price speculation for what’s coming is one of the popular topic when crypto price make a sudden move but people should stop thinking about target price and focus on Bitcoin adaption since price will continuosly pump when there’s still a hype and demand. That’s the best indicator if the price will continue to pump instead of guessing random number as target.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Im backing my informed opinion here, folks. Bitcoin vaulting to a staggering $100K in the 2024-2025 bull market isnt a flight of fancy; its a real prospect.Our ally, the Stock-to-Flow model, foresees a price leap due to Bitcoin's shrinking availability and swelling demand. The upcoming half-decade is decisive for Bitcoin as the quadrennial cycle, amplified by the 2024 halving event, could send prices ascending. This isnt financial guidance. Bitcoin's volatility means anything's possible, and elements like regulatory shifts and the overall economic mood can pull the strings any direction.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Every new bull market brings a new ATH and every new ATH is less impactful than the last one. I mean, in 2013-2014 bitcoin’s ATH was $1k. Then in the next bull during 2017, it went to $20k… that’s a x20 increase. The last ATH on the other hand though was $60k… that’s a big number too but it is only a 3 times increase. So we can expect a way less impactful new ATH this time. And my guess it the maximum price for this ATH will be something around $80k and $110k…

comments.author: retreat
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?No one can predict how high Bitcoin price will be in the next bullrun, but I personally predict that it will be able to pass its ATH. Even though we know that to reach that point the Bitcoin market will bleed first, but I believe that only those who remain patient and stay HOLD will be able to harvest profits. And I'm pretty confident on this one that it'll be able to pass its ATH.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?The increase or decrease in the price of bitcoin is influenced by various things, such as; miner, holder, fudder. But one thing is certain, every time a bitcoin halving event occurs, the price of Bitcoin must increase. Regarding the price, no one can say for sure what the price of bitcoin will be.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?Conservative estimates put bitcoin in 6 digits, $100k at least in the next bull run.And then there are speculators putting it around $150k-$180k tops, and others super bullish about it, $200k++. So there's a lot of speculations around and we really don't know what the price will be and what's the next all time high.The best thing to do though is to prepare your self, buy as much bitcoin as you can.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?We can predict by researching with many factors like future events which is halving , Mass Adoption, technical analysis and many more. We are still now in bear market and moving towards to a bull season. So After halving in 2024 Bitcoin will make new ATH which can be predicted surely. And if we see the halving history and it's pump then we can say Bitcoin will be more that 100k and it can be almost 150k . Also mass adoption will increase and many companies will be involved in Bitcoin. It's demand will be much more than our prediction. Wait for those golden days and grab your position before you regret.

comments.author: crypticj
comments.body: It's hard to say. I think it will go up like 5k at a time so we probably gonna see 35, then 40, 45, and so on. But it will start moving like this only when the economy will get better. Until then it will probably fluctuate back and forth and probably even go lower than 25k.But it's all just speculation and it doesn't really matter. You just need to buy bitcoin NOW and you will see 100k eventually.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.created_time: June 29, 2023, 07:30:11 AMLast edit: June 29, 2023, 07:47:14 AM by Spaceman1000$
comments.body: The next bull run is expected to be in 2024 and it will be on till 2025, though nobody can easily predict the price outcome hence it can go either ways, because bitcoin halving is said to be one of the determining factors.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Since this post is all about bitcoin future prediction I don't think this is the right section to post this type of topic, I believe we have a speculation board on this forum which is more suited for this topic.this is very hard to predict and no one knows what will happen in the future but all we can do is speculate about the price of Bitcoin in the future it is possible that bitcoin can reach a hundred thousand dollars or a bit more but we need to be careful and know how to read charts because it is also possible that bitcoin will perform a little better than its previous all-time high of 202, maybe 79,000$ this time around? If you have been accumulating since 2022 you should be fine and do not forget to take profit either ways, remember that higher price expectations are why some people got burned, they also expected 100k Bitcoin and they failed to take profit.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: You can get different predictions which many may be correct, many will also be wrong. But my contribution or advice would not to focused on the predictions you will get here, you can also do some research yourself, but be rest assured that it's all assumptions (something that is believed to be true without evidence or solid fact). It could turn around to be the opposite of the assumption. So if when this happens don't be surprised. If you are HOLDING, just keep HOLDING till the next bull run.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?I am very bullish on bitcoin, and I will also think about goals like surpassing ATH, the next bull market for bitcoin I believe there will be big and very positive changes to make btc hit ATHs new. I've looked at some analysis and read some news about possible next cycles, most of them coming to a scenario where you think bitcoin will cross $100000, and so if we're completely convinced. Depending on what happens in the future, the narrative that everyone is skeptical about current prices will be broken after what bitcoin will shape over time.bitcoin is expected to follow historical price trends and hit a new ATH in the next halving, honestly some of the events around which I think will create momentum for bitcoin to skyrocket will be plenty .

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: It’s really tough to make accurate predictions because so many things can happen that affect price, both good & bad. If I had to make predictions though I would say $75,000 in 2024 & $250,000 by the end of 2025. Do not trade with leverage based on my predictions, this is not financial advice & do your own research.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: The prediction of Bitcoin is something we can't really be certain of because when you expect it to rise it will fall and whenever you feel it will fall it goes up, so we need to stay on the positive side especially investors, that's to see it go up. Now we have it at $30k and it only went to $31k ones if I'm not mistaken, and since then we have been seeing it at $30k for sometime now so I'd say it might get up to $60k, if possibly before the next 2-3 months, before 2024/25 if might get to something extraordinary can't really say.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?I guess $170000. If bitcoin does not go up to $170000, I still believe that it would make all-time-high which would be in six digits. I mean at least, bitcoin will increase to over $100000. Quote from: MusaMohamed on June 29, 2023, 03:43:31 AMMinimally and less positively, I think Bitcoin will be exchanged around $70,000 in 2024 with the halving in April next year. Usually it will take Bitcoin about 6 to 9 months after its halving day to break its past all time high and make a new all time high.But did you know that from history, the next two years after halving is the all-time-high. Maybe or maybe not in this coming bull season, but bitcoin will increase above $70000, according to my analysis.Quote from: DeathAngel on June 29, 2023, 08:07:14 AMIt’s really tough to make accurate predictions because so many things can happen that affect priceBut in long term guess, bullish predictions are always correct.

comments.author: posi
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?No one can give a specific number, but as far as I can see, most people expect a new ATH of $100k. For my part, I firmly believe that we will have a super cycle because if everything goes as predicted, 2025 is also the perfect time for our economy to enter a phase of recovery and growth. Therefore, it will be very easy to trigger a super cycle for the market when investment demand increases. I predict bitcoin to hit $150k-180k in the next bull cycle.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Hold on June 29, 2023, 03:31:28 AMHow much do you think Bitcoin will rise to in the next round of bull market?Maybe times 2-4 from the last bull run price. That's like a safe guess on me but I want to see it increase more than that. Anyway, no matter what prices we pick, someone could unknowingly predict it happens whilst the majority of us won't hit the accurate one.What's important is that you're accumulating at this stage or else you'll just keep with the thought that you should have done that earlier when the bull run arrives and the price is enormous.Start with a few mbtc and use to calculate that so that you'll be encouraged to stock more.
